CET46:CET4_relic.NAME: Book of CET4
CET46:CET4_relic.FLAVOR: Rumor has it that all the vocabulary mysteries of CET4 are recorded.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you are about to play a card, send a quiz of Grade 4 word. The effect is determined by the accuracy of your answer. NL Right-click on this relic to trigger a quiz of correction.

CET46:CET6_relic.NAME: Book of CET6
CET46:CET6_relic.FLAVOR: Rumor has it that all the vocabulary mysteries of CET6 are recorded.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you are about to play a card, send a quiz of Grade 4 word. The effect is determined by the accuracy of your answer. NL Probability of Grade 4 words can be adjusted in the mod settings. NL Right-click on this relic to trigger a quiz of correction.
